participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is adventurous and introspective, often reflecting on her experiences in nature. She is sensitive and caring, particularly towards her pets.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is practical and hardworking, with a deep passion for his craft. He enjoys sharing stories and has a nurturing side, especially towards animals.
participant_2.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. i enjoy building houses. i have 5 cats. my dad taught me everything i know.
